name: Jojo & Matet: We Do, Take Two
name_original: Jojo & Matet: We Do, Take Two
description:
Details:

This is an app for a wedding/renewal of vows event that has already been cancelled due to COVID-19. The husband-and-wife team of Mr. Claudius Yango (a.k.a. Jojo, programmer/artist) and Dr. Beatrice Lapa-Yango (a.k.a. Matet, designer/content dev) had fun creating this, so we're making the app public for posterity's sake. Jojo & Matet chibi illustration was done by Sao Menguito.

To quote the designer: "Husband and I created an app invitation for this event. We bonded over this because this is the first project together that we actually FINISHED.  The first time we met was when we were working on a port of Dream Chronicles, and that was cancelled."

Description:

Jojo and Matet are celebrating their 8th anniversary as a couple and 3rd wedding anniversary with a Catholic ceremony. Join us they take their vows for a second time. #EightTakesTwoToYango

App Features:

  • Invitation
  • Theme
  • Entourage
  • Missalette 
  • Mini-Game
  • Map (Waze, Google Maps, and Spotify for the event playlist)
  • Menu
  • Seating Arrangements
  • Thank You notes

The download link gives you the option to get the Android app or access the browser version. You may donate through the link or just skip to the download part to access the app for free.
